items.sentence: Tom was the one who insisted that we leave early.
Tom was the one who suggested we try it this way.
Tom was the one who taught me how to play tennis.
I think Tom and I overdid it a little last night.
I thought that it was totally normal at the time.
I thought you always played football on Saturday.
Strangely enough, I didn\'t feel any pain at all.
Tell Tom I don\'t want to eat at that restaurant.
Why would anyone do this if they didn\'t have to?
Tom always drinks his coffee black with no sugar.
